it.polimi.se2019.client.net

Class SocketClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.client.net.SocketClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkClient

    public class SocketClient
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkClient
    The socket client is similar to the socket server but more simple due to the fact that it only needs to handle a single connection. This implementation is very standard.
    Author:
    FF

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SocketClient.SocketClientWorker
      This is the threaded handler of any incoming data from the server, its like another server but on the client side.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the socket, useful on exit
      void send(Request request)
      Send method, just prints the request to the socket writer
      void start(View view)
      Standard start method, it starts the socket and starts the socket client worker to take care of any incoming messages.
